name: Beach Trip
alt: Becca in a purple bikini and Rosalia in a white one-piece, at the beach.
description: A nice day at the beach, watching the sunset together.

name: Time for a Rest
alt: Becca in a purple cropped tank and sheer purple skirt, Rosalia in a sheer white nightgown, sitting on their bed together.
description: After a long day of adventuring, they like to decompress and chat about their day before sleep.

name: Clash of Legends
alt: Rosalia and Becca charging at each other, powerful auras surrounding them. Rosalia is wielding her greatsword, and Becca her staff.
description: To keep their skills sharp and their senses heightened, Becca and Rosalia often spar with each other.

name: Posing on the Couch
alt: Becca and Rosalia in shorts and tank tops, laying on the couch with their heads in the middle, stretching a leg up to strike a pose.
description: A local photographer had suggested this pose. Becca was hesitant, but Rosalia was eager to help, so they went through with it.

name: A Cute Date
alt: Becca wearing a purple open top and miniskirt, and Rosalia wearing a white open top and long skirt. They are sitting at an outdoor table enjoying a nice date.
description: Despite being busy adventurers, Rosalia and Becca always make time for each other.

name: Gaming Together
alt: The girls laying on the floor together, Rosalia playing a game on her phone while Becca provides advice.
description: Even when they're relaxing together, Becca can't help but give Rosalia tactical advice.

name: True Love
alt: Rosalia and Becca standing side by side, using their hands to make a heart together.
description: As much as they love each other, they also love those who support them.

name: Endless Studying
alt: Rosalia walking by as Becca sits at the table, lost in a book.
description: There are days where Rosalia can't get Becca to put the book down long enough to do anything else.

name: Going for a Dip
alt: Becca and Rosalia in their swimsuits, standing in the ocean, the water coming just below their hips.
description: What's a day at the beach if you don't have a little fun in the water?

name: The Real Treasure
alt: Rosalia and Becca sitting in a treasure chest.
description: That's... not how you're supposed to use a treasure chest.
